data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: I do not have to work tomorrow, so I want to do something fun. I ____ I ____ make ____ nice ____, ____ bring ____ to ____ zoo. I ____ spend ____ day ____ at ____ animals, and ____ I ____ sit ____ the ____ and ____ lunch. Maybe I will buy myself an ice cream at the end of the day.
data.partBlankContent: I do not have to work tomorrow, so I want to do something fun. I th___ I wi__ make so__ nice fo__, a__ bring i_ to t__ zoo. I c__ spend a__ day loo____ at t__ animals, and th__ I wi__ sit o_ the gr___ and e__ lunch. Maybe I will buy myself an ice cream at the end of the day.
data.fullContent: I do not have to work tomorrow, so I want to do something fun. I think I will make some nice food, and bring it to the zoo. I can spend all day looking at the animals, and then I will sit on the grass and eat lunch. Maybe I will buy myself an ice cream at the end of the day.
data.answer: 我明天不用工作，所以我想做一些有趣的事情。我想我会做好吃的食物，并把它带到动物园。我可以花一整天的时间看动物，然后我会坐在草地上吃午饭。也许我会在一天结束的时候给自己买一个冰激凌。
